generated_description: killias research and consulting is a company based in lenzburg, aargau, switzerland. founded in 2013 by prof. dr. martin killias, a former professor of criminal law, criminal procedure law, and criminology at the university of zurich, the company specialized in criminological research and legal consulting. the firm ceased its criminological research activities by the end of 2018. the company was led by prof. iur. h. c. martin killias until his retirement, after which it was managed by lorenz biberstein, ma.
